defaultValue.description: value to set on initial render

value.description: the selected value (must be accompanied by an `onChange` prop)

onChange.description: when used with the `value` prop, the component will not control its own state

size.description: The size of the value label

displayValue.description: whether to display the current value

formatValue.description: A function to format the displayed value

thumbVariant.description:
The "deprecated" variant has an outer shadow on focus.
The "accessible" variant has better color contrast, border and inset focus ring for better accessibility.

inputRef.description: A function that provides a reference to the actual underlying input element

title: RangeInput
